full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/24/2023 AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT STATE OF CALIFORNIA SS. COUNTY OF LOS ANGELES (1) I, DR. PETER F. Y. LEW , being duly sworn, depose and say: (2) That I am 56 years of age and was born at Canton, China. (3) That my present address is 5958 Franklin Avenue Street, City of Los Angeles , County of Los Angeles State of California (4) That I am a citizen of the United States by birth at (City or Town) , on (State) (Date) (5) That I was naturalized a citizen of the United States on June 11 1954 (Month) (Day) (Year) at Los Angeles , California , by the Los Angeles District (City or Town) (State) 7214639 Court Court and was issued Certificate of Naturalization No. (6) That I declared my intention to become a citizen of the United States and hold Declaration of Intention Certificate No. Issued at on (Month) (Day) (Year) (7) That I am not a citizen of the United States but that I was lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence on at , on the (Month) (Day) (Year) (Port) (Name of vessel or other means of conveyance) (8) That it is my intention and desire to have the following Person (s) at present residing at 124 Tai F'o Road, 1st Floor, Kowloon, Hong Kong, B.C.C. to come to the United States: Name of Alien Marital Status Age Sex Relationship Place & Date of Birth Mong Man Get Married 48 Male Personal Friend Kwangtung 8-22-1914 Wong, Fu Pui Fan a 42 Female 4-21-1920 Wong, Mee Kuen Single 17 Female 4 is is 2-29-1945 Wong, Tak Chung . 16 Male 44 941946 Wong, Tak Shun 15 Male 10- 5 1947 FOIA (b)(6) Yip Kum widow 57 Female 3-27-1905 (9) That I am employed as Dr. of Chiropractic- Herb with SELF (Position) (Name of Firm) at 5958 Franklin Ave., (Home Office) 850 So. Main St. Los Angeles, Cal. (Address) That my spouse's occupation is House wife ; that my (bis): (our) average weekly earnings are $ 200.00 ; that Bank Account is $ 2,000. average (10) That I (We), possess property aggregating: Real Estate $ 300,000.00 ; Mortgages on Real Estates $30,000.00 (11) That the cash value of stocks, bonds, insurance policies, mortgages, etc. is $ 5,000.00
